revised_title: A Detailed Account of the Hafodunos Earthquake Near Denbigh
tldr: The author, John Lloyd, describes an earthquake he experienced at Hafodunos near Denbigh on August 29, 1781. The earthquake lasted from fifteen to eighteen seconds and was felt in various locations. Lloyd provides details about the event, including the time, location, and intensity of the shaking, as well as accounts from others who experienced the earthquake.
